changelogs.name: Update 3.0.0 Private Beta
changelogs.content:
Hoi hoi ! It's been a long time since the last big update, so here's a quick heads up !
I finished the structure of v3 and rewrote all commands, there is still some stuff to finish(like catching bugs and adding new features) but we're nearly there ! 

On that note, see you at the v3 release(hopefully this month), love you all :heart:

changelogs.name: Update 2.5.0 Public Beta
changelogs.content: Full 2.5.0 release is running on the beta !

marketItems.name: :gift_heart: Love point
marketItems.description: Gives you an extra love point that you can use every 12 hours

marketItems.name: :arrow_double_up: Points booster
marketItems.description: Enable a points booster of +5% each time you win any points, that of course does not apply to transfers
